title: Add task too many steps
notes: Participant avoids task tools if adding items feels slow or effortful; current add form has multiple steps and fields, increasing workload.

title: Controls unclear and cluttered
notes: Participant needs a simple, clean UI; current interface has several similar buttons and icons, and some are not clearly labelled for screen reader users.

title: Risk of accidental task loss
notes: No undo or trash for deleted tasks; anxious users worry tasks may be lost by mistake and may avoid using delete or the app entirely.

title: Manual rollover of unfinished tasks
notes: User wants unfinished tasks to move automatically to the next day; manual copying of recurring tasks is tiring and error-prone over long-term use.
